article_title: WSJ/NBC Poll Finds Wide Support for Quarantining Health Workers
article_text:
Registered voters by a wide margin back quarantines of doctors and nurses who treat Ebola patients in West Africa, according to a Wall Street Journal/NBC News poll that shows broad support for policies some states have adopted but health workers oppose.

Nearly three-fourths of those polled between Thursday and Saturday said they agreed with 21-day quarantines for returning health workers even if they haven’t yet developed symptoms of...
